abstract: Phillips has appointed Hugues Joffre its new worldwide head of 20th century art, and Sotheby’s said it was opening its first office in India.

headline.main: Phillips and Sotheby’s Announce Strategic Moves
headline.print_headline: Phillips and Sotheby’s Seek to Strengthen Brand

snippet: Phillips has appointed Hugues Joffre its new worldwide head of 20th century art, and Sotheby’s said it was opening its first office in India.
